definition: erhua variant of 軟泥|软泥[ruan3 ni2]

sentences.english: What is the origin of pelagic oozes ?
sentences.chinese: 遠洋軟泥的來源是什麼？

sentences.english: Our feet skitter and our fingers slip on the icy ooze.
sentences.chinese: 在結冰的軟泥上面，我們的手腳打滑。

sentences.english: The islands consist of oyster reefs covered with a thin veneer of black mud .
sentences.chinese: 由牡蠣礁構成的小島上覆蓋着一層薄薄的黑色軟泥。

sentences.english: Soon layer of oceanic ooze began to accumulate above the old hard layer.
sentences.chinese: 不久後海洋軟泥層開始在老的硬地層上堆積。

sentences.english: Her daughter likes to shape things from soft clay.
sentences.chinese: 她女兒喜歡用軟泥捏各種東西。

sentences.english: The ooze water of these various types belongs to low metamorphic water.
sentences.chinese: 這些不同類型的軟泥水均屬軟泥階段的淺變質水。

sentences.english: The ooze water of these various types belongs to low metamorphic water.
sentences.chinese: 這些不同類型的軟泥水均屬軟泥階段的淺變質水。

sentences.english: Do you think of algae as gloopy green slime?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得海藻像是用軟膠厚塗的綠色軟泥嗎？

definition: (bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
extraordinary strength/super strong/strong as an ox
Horse-Face, one of the two guardians of the underworld in Chinese mythology
to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
